title: Firefox for Android 44.0.2 Release

notes.note:
Launch from homescreen bookmark always opens new tab and sometimes does nothing ([1245516][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1245516

Adjust SDK is not configured to include play-services-analytics ([1233238][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1233238

text: We'd also like to extend a special thank you to all of the new Mozillians who contributed to this release of Firefox!
